title: Edit Distance
statement: Given two strings S1 and S2, find the minimum number of operations to convert S1 to S2. Allowed operations: insert, delete, or replace a character.
input_format:
First line contains string S1.
Second line contains string S2.
output_format: Print the minimum number of operations.
constraints:
0 <= |S1|, |S2| <= 500
Strings contain only lowercase English letters.
